title: HOW THE FUCK DO U TELL THE OTHER TEAM THAT U HAVE SOMEONE MASTRD ??????????????
body: dafuq what and how do I do it dumb game dosnt tell

replies.body: do you even english? i think ctrl 6 is what you are looking for
ctrl 6 doesn't work for enemy team yet

why are there so many calm, serious and helpful responses to an obviously toxic af person who has titled this thread in full caps, multiple spelling/grammar mistakes and an influx of unnecessary question marks to suggest hes pissed off and wants, nay, NEEDS your IMMEDIATE attention and help in solving his incredibly important difficult predicament?

this is like giving a screaming and crying kid in a packed store exactly what he wants even when you said no multiple times. cant wait for you'se to be parents soon and to hear those deafening screams in every shopping centre real soon {{champion:122}} ...
If its mastered, you get a little symbol when you kill, and they are putting in CTRL 6 for enemies to see soon as well

ok what lvl ? dose the person need to be?
im lvl 4 almost lvl 5 
with ahri
level 4 is just a little 1 under your face icon on kill/death and then same with rank 5, but at rank 5, your double/triple/quad/penta get pimped up as well

you need to press CTRL+6 if you are rank 4 or 5, you need to confirm you are 4 or 5 in your champion page though
I assume you are talking about the champ mastery icon that appears over your head in game, hold ctrl key and press 5 i believe is the default setting, 6 maybe
